file.name: api-v2.2.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: '2.2'
  title: OSMCAL API
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: 'http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html'
servers:
  - url: 'https://osmcal.org/api'
tags:
  - name: Events
paths:
  /v2/events/:
    get:
      description: Retrieve list of upcoming events
      tags:
        - Events
      parameters:
        - name: in
          in: query
          description: Limit returned events to a given country. The country should be specified as ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.
          required: false
          example: "de"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: Accept-Language
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 'pt-BR'
          description: The user's locale. This will cause human-readable dates to be localized.
        - name: Client-App
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 'osmcal-widget/1.0.0'
          description: Please send some kind of identification of your app, so we can find out easier who you are, if need be.
      responses:
        200:
          description: List of events (soonest first)
          content:
            'application/json':
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Events"
                
  /v2/events/past/:
    get:
      description: Retrieve list of past events
      tags:
        - Events
      parameters:
        - name: in
          in: query
          description: Limit returned events to a given country. The country should be specified as ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.
          required: false
          example: "de"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: Accept-Language
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 'pt-BR'
          description: The user's locale. This will cause human-readable dates to be localized.
        - name: Client-App
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 'osmcal-widget/1.0.0'
          description: Please send some kind of identification of your app, so we can find out easier who you are, if need be.
      responses:
        200:
          description: List of events (recently passed first)
          content:
            'application/json':
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Events"

  /v1/events/:
    get:
      deprecated: true
      description: Retrieve list of upcoming events
      tags:
        - Events
      parameters:
        - name: in
          in: query
          description: Limit returned events to a given country
          required: false
          example: "Germany"
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: List of events (soonest first)
          content:
            'application/json':
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/EventsV1"
                
  /v1/events/past/:
    get:
      deprecated: true
      description: Retrieve list of past events
      tags:
        - Events
      parameters:
        - name: in
          in: query
          description: Limit returned events to a given country
          required: false
          example: "Germany"
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: List of events (recently passed first)
          content:
            'application/json':
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/EventsV1"

components:
  schemas:
    Events:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        required:
          - name
          - url
          - date
        properties:
          name:
            type: string
            example: "Mapping Party #23"
          url:
            type: string
            example: "https://osmcal.org/event/23/"
            description: "Link to event on OSMCAL"
          date:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Date"
          location:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Location"
          cancelled:
            type: boolean
            default: false
            example: true
            description: Indicates whether event has been cancelled. Omited if not.
  
    Date:
      type: object
      required:
        - start
        - human
        - human_short
        - whole_day
      properties:
        start:
          type: string
          example: "2020-05-24T12:00:00+09:00"
          description: Start Date as ISO 8601 string
        end:
          type: string
          example: "2020-05-24T14:00:00+09:00"
          description: End Date as ISO 8601 string, optional
        human:
          type: string
          example: "24th May 12:00–14:00"
        human_short:
          type: string
          example: "24th May"
          description: Only displays the date (range) without time. Useful for e.g. list views.
        whole_day:
          type: boolean
          example: false
      description: Date object, with start date, end date (optional), human date (preferred way of display, localized) and indication, whether the event is a full-day event (`whole_day`).
  
    EventsV1:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        required:
          - name
          - url
          - date
        properties:
          name:
            type: string
            example: "Mapping Party #23"
          url:
            type: string
            example: "https://osmcal.org/event/23/"
            description: "Link to event on OSMCAL"
          date:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/DateV1"
          location:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Location"
          cancelled:
            type: boolean
            default: false
            example: true
            description: Indicates whether event has been cancelled. Omited if not.
    DateV1:
      type: object
      required:
        - start
      properties:
        start:
          type: string
          example: "2020-05-24 12:00:00"
        end:
          type: string
          example: "2020-05-24 14:00:00"
        human:
          type: string
          example: "24th May 12:00–14:00"
        whole_day:
          type: boolean
          example: false
      description: Date object, with start date, end date (optional), human date (preferred way of display, localized) and indication, whether the event is a full-day event (`whole_day`).
    Location:
      type: object
      required:
        - coords
      properties:
        short:
          type: string
          example: "Osaka, Japan"
        detailed:
          type: string
          example: "Tosabori-dori, Chuo, Osaka, Japan"
        coords:
          type: array
          example: [135.5023, 34.6931]
          items:
            type: number
          description: "Coordinates in lon/lat"
        venue:
          type: string
          example: "Cool Pub"
externalDocs:
  description: OSMCAL User Documentation
  url: https://osmcal.org/documentation/
